prompts.prompt:
Create a web application that calculates deciles, terciles, and quartiles based on the position of a journal within the total number of journals in a category of the Journal Citation Reports (JCR). The application should function similarly to the website provided as a reference (https://www.uv.es/hemesalud/tercil.htm). The user should be able to input the position of the journal and the total number of journals in the category, and the application will calculate and display the decile, tercile, and quartile of that journal.

The application should have a simple and user-friendly interface, allowing for easy input and clear display of the results. Ensure that the calculations for deciles, terciles, and quartiles are accurate and conform to standard statistical methods.
